website_summaries.verdict: Strong magnets that come with security guarantee and impressive range of adjustability.
pros: Super strong magnet that works even with dense, thick protective phone cases
Compatible with almost all smart phones and has simple one-hand operation for easy adjustments
Design is streamlined and modern, so it doesn’t look out of place in your car
cons: Some reports that suction detaches in extreme temperatures and has difficulty sticking to some dashboards

customer_reviews.title: Magnetic Car Mount
customer_reviews.text: I've really started liking these magnetic car mounts. They provide you with several magnets both circular and rectangular shapes to put on the back of our phone. I have a silicon case on my phone so I just slip it in without needing to stick it on with the adhesive and it still works well. This is a nice high quality mount. It telescopes and tilts easily. The suction cup holds tight! Time will tell how it holds up in hot weather but I have high expectations for this car mount!
customer_reviews.author: Papayaman

customer_reviews.title: nice car phone  mount
customer_reviews.text: I was a little worried that the magnetic phone car molunt might not be able to handle my needs, but I've had zero issues with it holding my iPhone X through the thick case. The car phone mount is very sturdy and allows for positioning in a multitude of angles. After some adjustment, it's exactly where I want it, and there's no fall down or issues with the stand shifting position. I use it in my truck and the suction cup is very sticky and has been moved twice in my truck over the last few months without issue.Overall it’s perfect for my use case and I recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: muxing weng

customer_reviews.title: Very useful
customer_reviews.text: Before buying this I was using heads-up display style mount, but it was blocking road view, as it was sitting right above instrument cluster. This car mount solves my needs, as this can be mounted on dash board and even on windshield and its Telescopic arm allows to adjust the reach, so it doesn’t block the road view.
customer_reviews.author: Aru

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I guarantee that this is the most satisfactory time for me to buy a car phone holder. It can be installed in the car very well. I just adjust the phone bracket to the angle I want and put the phone on it, it will automatically lock the phone. On the device, the base is very strong. Although it is bumpy on the road, it can still be fixed on my dashboard. It is one of my best assistants. Believe me, you will not be disappointed with this bracket!
customer_reviews.author: Sophia Zeng

customer_reviews.title: Amazing phone holder
customer_reviews.text: Sucks and sticks to my surface. My surface curves a little, but it is flat curved. Not like other surfaces where it has tiny bumps. It holds up great. Use it for every drive. Would definitely buy another when it cant stick anymore. But I have cleaned washed it once before, and continued to stick. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Lui8i

customer_reviews.title: Does not last
customer_reviews.text: Lasted 1 year and 9 days. The suction cup and telescoping are were still intact, but the area with the magnet broke clean off. Appears that the plastic became brittle as time went on. Completely unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok look cheap
customer_reviews.text: Not strong when u have it behind 3mm rubber otter case. Put 2 or 3 magnet improves it. Extension arm kinda short and look like cheap plastic or metal.
customer_reviews.author: xox

customer_reviews.title: Great suction cup and magnet is very strong
customer_reviews.text: Works great holds tight I bought 2 of them one for in the house and one for in my truck I have a s9+ and it has never fallen off the one in my truck broke and there customer service was great I sent them pictures of what broke and they replaced it right away
customer_reviews.author: Joel johns

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be easier
customer_reviews.text: Holds windshield and phone firmly. Phone is easy to remove. Worked with my existing phone case that had a metal ring on the back. Didn't even need the magnets it came with.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Pakeltis

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Works well for me. Had to learn not to bump the fone too hard when shifting etc. It will handle light bumps. I drive a cement mixer with rock hard suspension and road bumps don't shake it loose.
customer_reviews.author: A Piatt

customer_reviews.title: 10 months
customer_reviews.text: Both of the items I received finally failed after 10 months. The adheaive failed on one and the plastic ball joint failed on the other.
customer_reviews.author: B. Kim

customer_reviews.title: It’s great!!!! Holds big phones very well.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my boyfriend so he can be hands free while driving and he loves it. I don’t know what kind of phone he has but it’s huge and the magnet holds it very securely. Took all of 3 seconds to install.
customer_reviews.author: Eliza J.

customer_reviews.title: Best quality, least expensive
customer_reviews.text: If you want a good phone holder, this is the one you want. This one was the least expensive but is the best. The only thing I had to do was hold it down on my dash and then let it sit overnight to get it to adhere.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Dillow

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and install
customer_reviews.text: I tried many phone holder and this is very easy to install and hold the phone strongly. The magnet is so power to hold the phone the same position. I like it so far
customer_reviews.author: Joe Awesome

customer_reviews.title: Overall good
customer_reviews.text: Only complaint is the arm extension can’t be tightened/locked so when putting phone on it sometimes retracts. Not a big deal and doesn’t slide during driving. Far superior to my previous flex arm mount that druped over time and the head swiveled easily. This does none of that. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan C. Fibbs

customer_reviews.title: You better buy this
customer_reviews.text: I've gone through a lot of Car mounts, this one has allowed me to mount my phone directly underneath my mirror so I can see everything in front of me. This is the best car mount I've ever found for half the price of some of the ones I've purchased, very rigid and the extension is long enough to get to places most other Mounds can't
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Never comes off my windshield. Even in extreme heat. Fully adjustable with telescoping arm. Magnet is strong. My iPhone XS Max has never fall off. The metal plate that goes under the phone case is so thin, that it doesn’t impact the fit of my very slim line case.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid purchase
customer_reviews.text: Does the job and is holding up to this Texas climate.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Winfree

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: The installation was very simple and the product works great. I was surprised at how well it holds my phone. I will be purchasing another one soon for my truck.
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: Good while it lasted ...
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: Received free replacement and am happy with the product and customer service. Loved this product for about four to five months, and still would had it not spontaneously broken into several pieces at the ball/socket connection. Now, the stand is completely useless!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Vincent Reed

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Had a bit of a hard time trying to stick it on dashboard but eventually it did. Other than that is great. i love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yessss buy this
customer_reviews.text: This my 4th one. One in each car. I broke the first one driving for a ride share company. The 4 th on I bought for a family member
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: can not complain
customer_reviews.text: Just bought this holder for a long distance trip. Works very well. Have zero complains. The price is so reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s good quality. Not cheap feeling!
customer_reviews.text: Literally had no problem with this mount . It was easy to use and easy to install. And holds my phone very well even over bumps and railroad tracks and pot holes. Hasn’t failed me yet , and I’m very picky about these kinds of things so believe me when I say it works and it’s the best bang for your buck !
customer_reviews.author: John Hinson

customer_reviews.title: Meh, 1 out of 3 worked for me
customer_reviews.text: 1 out of 3 have worked so far, won't be ordering again. 2 of them would not lock in suction when I pushed the lever down unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: j21blackjack

customer_reviews.title: Fits my phone but popped right off
customer_reviews.text: It wouldnt stick to my dash or window very long before falling off. Probably going to end up using velcostrips on the bottom to hold it in place instead.
customer_reviews.author: Cephalon Ghost

customer_reviews.title: Works great in my car!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a car mount that can be installed in a variety of ways. Coincidentally, I saw this car phone holder.This car phone holder has three ways to install, I like it very much, and it is very easy to install. What's more, I bring this car holder every time when I go out, because I can adjust the right angle according to my own preferences.
customer_reviews.author: Harding Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Great mount for windshield!
customer_reviews.text: Overall a great mount. I keep the metal plate under my Otterbox's silicone cover and it holds just fine. However it works significantly better on the windshield than the dash.
customer_reviews.author: No

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had it on my window for 2 months and it's broken
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Won't stick
customer_reviews.text: I followed all directions and couldn't get the darned thing to stick even once. It feels sticky but won't adhere to the pebbled surface of my dash.
customer_reviews.author: Lori E

customer_reviews.title: It doesn’t swivel
customer_reviews.text: Really the only complaint I have is it doesn’t swiveling
customer_reviews.author: David Montero

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. The magnet is really strong and the suction cup is really strong. Be careful pulling your phone off the magnet it's so strong that I almost pulled up my dashboard. Lol.. I guess you can't complain about an item working too well.
customer_reviews.author: Taaven

customer_reviews.title: Great until broke
customer_reviews.text: The item worked great until I stuck the magnetic back directly on my Iphone-11, when I pulled the phone end of the holder where the permanent magnet was fell apart and broke off in pieces, 4 months after purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Michael B. Shulevitz

customer_reviews.title: Watch out if u live in a hot area
customer_reviews.text: Initially I liked this product then summer came. The rubber disc that sticks to the window has actually melted and it is stuck! I will have to use some goo-gone to remove what is left behind. Really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Best phone holder .
customer_reviews.text: Compact side with strong holding power. Easy to instal and adjust angle. Telescopic rod gives comfortability to adjust the phone for better vision
customer_reviews.author: jimmi

customer_reviews.title: Need a replacement skrew
customer_reviews.text: The strew broke that holds the magnet on the ball. On now it’s just stuck on my dashboard and I can’t even use it. Can they a replacement head and strew?
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Durden

customer_reviews.title: It's Great
customer_reviews.text: It very great, it sticks amazingly. The neck of the device is very stiff and sturdy, just how I wanted it. Only little problem is the joints that you tighten up get loose sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: jesus sandoval

customer_reviews.title: Very nice mount, too bad the telescopic pole has wiggle in it.
customer_reviews.text: this mount has probably been my favorite I have bought, and will continue to use, although after a month or two of use now, I now have a pretty 90 degreeish wiggle in the mount along the telescopic pole.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Bland

customer_reviews.title: holds phone great with stability
customer_reviews.text: Strong, secure phone holding device. Allows clear view of phone and easy movement from horizontal to vertical or from driver view to passenger view. I love this device...
customer_reviews.author: oshosanyasee

customer_reviews.title: Works Perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Suction and never failed and magnet is strong. No problems.
customer_reviews.author: Amos Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Not for summer
customer_reviews.text: Summer, hot weather, dark car interior...don't bother with this one. Will not stick to the dashboard nor the window.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Happy with it
customer_reviews.text: It is very simple and useful. Happy with it. Heighly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Defective product
customer_reviews.text: I brought this on June but star using it on January in my new car. Only two weeks later the arm broke down. Viewing the others reviews my thoughts are this one came defective for sure
customer_reviews.author: Jose Lanao

customer_reviews.title: firm and safe mount
customer_reviews.text: oh, god. what a powerful magnetic mount. my phone case is very heavy,but it held firmly on the small mount. the expandable pole is very usful in limit car space.
customer_reviews.author: melody

customer_reviews.title: not sticky after a while
customer_reviews.text: This worked well at first but a month into it the adhesion around the edges began to wear off and then it would not stick at all.
customer_reviews.author: David Faigenblum

customer_reviews.title: Great on the Window
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Holds my phone really well and did not drop it.
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle Fincher

customer_reviews.title: Truly a Hazard!
customer_reviews.text: Although I clean the glass the device falls while driving . Is there a solution for this problem.?
customer_reviews.author: Skip

customer_reviews.title: Works like it's supposed to
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm. Great suction/adhesion. Can't pull the thing off the desk.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Perfect phone holder
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect in my expedition and Kia Sorento mounted under the rear view mirror
customer_reviews.author: Rudy T Reilly

customer_reviews.title: Decent.
customer_reviews.text: Overall a good product but the magnet is not very firm, the phone moves with the magnet.
customer_reviews.author: daniel ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Can be good if you buy an adhesive also
customer_reviews.text: It does not stick well. Have to use alternative adhesives to make it stick. Does not secure phone the greatest.
customer_reviews.author: daniel

customer_reviews.title: A little struggling to install but overall fine!
customer_reviews.text: The package comes really fast. Not really easy to install but it adheres super strong!
customer_reviews.author: Y Luong

customer_reviews.title: Works for two months only
customer_reviews.text: I have two months that with product and my device not stabilized, product not works
customer_reviews.author: Wesley Da Silva

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t like it! It broke and my phon fell! I wish I could get a refund! Don’t buy!
customer_reviews.author: yvonne

customer_reviews.title: USELESS
customer_reviews.text: a waste of money, it falls off al the time.
customer_reviews.author: Alex K.

customer_reviews.title: This item did not work for me. I am returning it.
customer_reviews.text: Too hard on assebke and did not adhere to surface.
customer_reviews.author: Zoola

customer_reviews.title: Only lasts a few months
customer_reviews.text: Great mount until it broke in less than 4 months.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Talent

customer_reviews.title: not durable
customer_reviews.text: I love this product until one day I put my phone up and my phone fell and the magnet part where it meets the ball just disintegrated and fell into 1 million pieces. Update: 7/22/19. this seller was extremely responsive as they handled the situation well, they replaced the product with no problem and was very easy to deal with. My only concern is that the product itself is not made all quality material. The design is great but I think the manufacturer should upgrade the quality of the materials. Without that I don’t think it will last and therefore not a good value.
customer_reviews.author: aRcaNum55

customer_reviews.title: Appearances are deceiving.
customer_reviews.text: Jabuer product looks good and worked well for 2 months. Before the plastic Mount started separating from the suction cup due to inferior plastic stem. Eventually at the two and a half month mark the suction cup stayed on the window why the plastic base fell off. I would buy this style of Mount again although I will not be buying this brand again. It looks like a high-quality product. Although appearances are deceiving.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Loved it til......
customer_reviews.text: I’d give it a 5 star review but...... the cellphone holder gets a 5 STAR The suction works good, the adhesive WAS great but now it’s all melted and doesn’t work anymore. I live in Florida so we know how it can be humid and all. It had been working great til just the other day ( nice day, not humid) got in my car and it was hanging off my windshield by the adhesive 😔 See picture
customer_reviews.author: KCC

customer_reviews.title: Love this phone car mount
customer_reviews.text: The magnet is very stron I have to tell that it holds my iphone XR securely. I tested on the roads no problem. Better suction power than best seller products. I used to have one that keep on dropping when I was on the way. It is frasturating if you have expensive car. So easy to install. It will stick whenever you want.
customer_reviews.author: Mehmet Turan

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: Probably a great cellphone holder, but there was no place to install in my vehicle. If the suction cup was smaller (with same force), I would have been able to use it. The diameter is just to large for the space I have. Had to chunk this in a drawer and buy another 😢.
customer_reviews.author: Tate

customer_reviews.title: Dont put the magnet under your phone case unless you are sure it will work
customer_reviews.text: I put my magnet under my case because I didnt want it on the outside. It will hold until I go over a bump. I travel for work and must be able to see my phone when someone is calling me. It is not helpful when it is on the floor.... As a plus, It worked for my GPS that is not in a case and is much bigger than my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Cosper

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't expect much from this phone mount, but wow! I was surprised on how strong the magnets are on this thing! The phone feels ultra stable and doesn't feel like it's going to fall off. This magnetic phone holder is awesome! Going to recommend this to my friends!
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Lau

customer_reviews.title: Breaks Easily
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I have ordered and it broke in the same place again. The magnet broke off from the bracket that attaches the magnet onto the main extension. Very frustrated with this. Poor quality!!!
customer_reviews.author: J. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Magnetic ring adjust ring broke with one 49 days. A little disappointing compared to other ones I’ve had in the past which Have lasted for years
customer_reviews.author: Draptor725

customer_reviews.title: LOW PRICE IS  ECONOMY AND GREAT VALUE!!
customer_reviews.text: Usually a low price means crappy ,cheap product and subpar customer service....in this case NOT!! LOW PRICE IS ECONOMY AND GREAT VALUE!!
customer_reviews.author: Playmaker70

customer_reviews.title: No locking on arm.
customer_reviews.text: The magnet works good. The problem I have is when you pull your phone off it fully extends your arm. There is no locking
customer_reviews.author: m yoo

customer_reviews.title: Great suction!
customer_reviews.text: Product is well built and so far has stuck to the dashboard without fault. Have had this for about three months now. Have recommended to other friends and family members.
customer_reviews.author: Derick L. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great holder
customer_reviews.text: I like this holder that it sticks tightly on my dashboard and can adiust the distances between you and cell phone. The quality is also very good and the price is good.
customer_reviews.author: Wasabi~~

customer_reviews.title: Not what your looking for
customer_reviews.text: It broke into pieces not even a month after purchase. And before it broke it still didn’t hold the phone strong enough.
customer_reviews.author: bonnylene

customer_reviews.title: Not well made
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this product for less than a year and it broke with regular use...
customer_reviews.author: HyleTX

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Sticks and works great. Exactly what we were looking for. Adjusts up and down and then the magnetic part adjusts as well n
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I have this holder on my windshield and it definitely serves its purpose! It holds my 7plus very securely...easy to insert and easy to release. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Vikings1

customer_reviews.title: Works as Advertised!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, strong "stay put" magnetic suction, flexible swivel feature when needed. Perfect for my Samsung Galaxy S9 plus phone.
customer_reviews.author: RayP

customer_reviews.title: Strong Magnet.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect magnet. Good suction. Uses it on my school bus with no problem
customer_reviews.author: Trinitys World

customer_reviews.title: Falls off in the heat
customer_reviews.text: Falls off the dashboard when it gets hot. Otherwise works fine
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: Durability
customer_reviews.text: It had great suction and I like the ability to adjust it closer to view.
customer_reviews.author: James M Hertzler

customer_reviews.title: Love it, until! :(
customer_reviews.text: I loved it until after 3 months it broke while I was removing my phone.
customer_reviews.author: SpiderX

product_meta.title: Magnetic Phone Car Mount, Jabuer Phone Holder for Car Dashboard and Windshield with 6 Strong Magnets and Metal Telescopic Arm, for iPhone Xs Max/XR/XS/X/8/7/6/6S, Galaxy S9/S8/S7/Note9/Note8 and More
product_meta.description:
Color:black-016 Strong Magnets:
With the 6 strong magnets provide magnetic which is much stronger than normal 4 magnets. You will be able to notice the powerful grip once you place the magnet close to the mount for a firm locking system.ensuring your phone stays more securely while driving and wobble-free.

Extensive Compatibility:
Jabuer cell phone magnetic car mount is a great solution for all smartphones in different model. Perfectly fit for smart phones like iPhone XS XR XS Max X 8 8 Plus 7 7 Plus SE 6s 6Plus6 ,Samsung Note 9/ Galaxy S9/ S8 /S7 /S6 /Edge S6 /S5 /S4, Huawei Mate 10/ P10/ 9 Pro, LG Nexus/G6/ G5/ V20 /G3, Google Pixel, Sony, Nokia, Huawei and More.

Double Lock:
A premium gel ensures that the gel base will stick firmly to the dashboard or windshield. In addition,super crystal nano material Suction Pad sticks tightly on the dashboard,Remove easily without leaving any frustrated nasty mark!

Washable & Reusable Suction Pad:
Jabuer Magnetic Cell Phone Holder is equipped with the reusable suction cup, just rinse with warm water and air dry which allows you to wash the suction cup frequently without losing the adhesion.

Adjustable optimal viewing angle:
The magnetic head can be rotated 270 degree, prevents you from blocking your view while driving, which allows you to adjust a satisfied viewing.

Package Include:
1 * Magnetic Car Mount
4 * Adhesive Metal Plates
4 * Protective Films
feature_bullets: Strongest Magnetic Power: The 6 strong rare earth magnet cores provide a strong grasp and 100% security guarantee for your mobile device. A strong gel base which is twice strong as other car phone holders. Whether you are suddenly braking or driving on rough or steep roads, you can stay stable.

One Hand Operation:Simply insert the metal plate between the phone and the phone case, and release or lock the mobile device with one hand, so that the lever on the suction cup can firmly grasp the instrument panel and securely fix it on the entire drive.

360 Degree Rotation:The phone can be rotated 360 degrees by rotating the ball to adjust the angle of view. Telescopic arm can extend from 12.5cm (4.92in) to 20cm (7.87in) and pivot up or down for optimal viewing height.

Universal Compatibility:This car magnetic phone Mount holder is compatible with most smart phones like iPhone XS/ XS MAX/ X /8 /7 /6S /6 /Plus /5S, Samsung Note 9/ Galaxy S9/ S8 /S7,LG G6 / G5 / V20 / G3,Sony,Google and More.

Customer Service: If you have any questions, please contact us in time, we will provide you with 12 months of free after-sales guarantee and 24 hours quick reply. 【Note】In order to make the installation more stable, please attach the metal plate directly to the back of the device, do not stick to the phone case!
